statement.p: In the figure below, the angles that appear to be right angles are in fact right angles. Lengths in the figure are given in units of centimeters.

Image DescriptionA closed shape with five straight sides, with its interior shaded, where four of its five sides are either horizontal or vertical. Beginning at the top left corner and moving straight down, the path around the shape starts with a side that is labeled 62 centimeters, then moving to the right, a side is labeled 61 centimeters, then moving diagonally up and right, a side is labeled 37 centimeters, then moving straight up, a side is unlabeled, and finally moving to the left, a side is labeled 96 centimeters, connecting back to the original starting point at top left.
What is the area of the shaded shape? Give your answer as a decimal number, and then choose the correct units from the dropdown menu.
